!Master Gobie: Did you deliver the report? I have recived deeply troubling news: our Xekerin Troops were all but annihilated. Our rangers discovered their corpses. Tak, the staff officer of the OI Mahum we sought to captute, must have known of our plans! I have no additinal troops to devote to this task -- what shall we do ?
